name: Ninja Trap Tower
description:
Avoid traps and collect golden archways to reach the next level. Each level is randomly generated. The higher you climb up the tower, the more challenging the traps you will encounter. You will gain more rewards while reaching upper levels. Customize your gaming experience. Can you survive the challenge?

6 Supported Languages:

- English

- Turkish

- Italian

- French

- German

- Spanish

New features each week!

Thanks for playing.

by Uniqport Games
